name: KILL Ben Shapiro
description:
Ben Shapiro is a hack fraud paid by the bullshit artists at Turning Point USA. They believe that college campuses are "Toooooo libbeeeral", because their shitty views (often racist, sexist, transphobic, etc) aren't taught there. Their arguments are littered with fallacies, bad or nonexistent research. They're scumbags basically. 

Ben Shapiro is noted as being a huge piece of shit, though only huge in the metaphorical sense, because in reality he's so tiny a child would step on him.
